<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/44d6652d561d628d12e3ff7f6636ea7d1f805ced|patch 8.2.1632: not checking the context of test_fails()>
patch 8.2.1632: not checking the context of test_fails()

Problem:    Not checking the context of test_fails().
Solution:   Add the line number and context arguments.  Give error if
            assert_fails() argument types are wrong.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1632: not checking the context of test_fails() · vim/vim@44d6652
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1632: not checking the context of test_fails() · vim/vim@44d6652
attachments.text: Problem: Not checking the context of test_fails(). Solution: Add the line number and context arguments. Give error if assert_fails() argument types are wrong.

patch 8.2.1631: test_fails() does not check the context of the line number

Problem:    test_fails() does not check the context of the line number.
Solution:   Use another argument to specify the context of the line number.

attachments.text: …umber Problem: test_fails() does not check the context of the line number. Solution: Use another argument to specify the context of the line number.

Solution:   Check for terminal feature.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/418155def2aa45afd7fc034db341dc874b00af3a|patch 8.2.1628: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to timer_paused()>
patch 8.2.1628: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to timer_paused()

Problem:    Vim9: cannot pass "true" to timer_paused().
Solution:   Use tv_get_bool(). (closes #6891)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1628: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to timer_paused() · vim/vim@418155d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1628: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to timer_paused() · vim/vim@418155d
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to timer_paused(). Solution: Use tv_get_bool(). (closes #6891)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ad30470610e228e66afb837fdbab6bea36c43de4|patch 8.2.1627: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to submatch/term_gettty/term…>
patch 8.2.1627: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to submatch/term_gettty/term_start

Problem:    Vim9: cannot pass "true" to submatch(), term_gettty() and
            term_start()
Solution:   Use tv_get_bool_chk(). (closes #6888, closes #6890, closes #6889)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1627: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to submatch/term_gettty/term… · vim/vim@ad30470

attachments.text: …_start Problem: Vim9: cannot pass "true" to submatch(), term_gettty() and term_start() Solution: Use tv_get_bool_chk(). (closes #6888, closes #6890, closes #6889)
